Label: IMP-8 Fluxgate Magnetometer, 15.36-Second Resolution Data - A. Szabo / R.P. Lepping (NASA GSFC)

DatasetLink.Title: Full documentation may be found at

VariableDescription.Name: SourceFlag
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Data source flag =1 if based on 320ms data, = 2 if based  on old V2 15.36s data
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     SOURCE_NAME                     IMP-8>Interplanetary Monitoring Platform 8
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     DATA_TYPE                       15sec>15.36 sec Resolution
#     DESCRIPTOR                      MAG>Fluxgate Magnetometer
#     DATA_VERSION                    3
#     PI_NAME                         A. Szabo / R.P. Lepping
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  NASA GSFC
#     TEXT                            This 15.36s data set was created in 2008-9 at GSFC/SPDF from a newly created                           
#     TEXT                             320ms data set, with some gaps filled with data from the prior 15.36s data                            
#     TEXT                             set.  Full documentation may be found at ftp://nssdcftp.gsfc.nasa.gov/spacecraft_data/imp/imp8/mag/15s
#     TEXT                              Creation of the new 320ms and 15.36s data sets was done by N. Papitashvili                           
#                                      and J. King, with guidance from Adam Szabo.                                                           
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   IMP (All)
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  i8_15sec_mag
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 i8_15sec_mag_00000000_v03
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      IMP-8 Fluxgate Magnetometer, 15.36-Second Resolution Data
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 15.36 second
#     GENERATION_DATE                 Thu Feb 18 13:11:50 2010
#     MODS                            Master CDF made 02/16/10 by N. E. Papitashvili, SPDF Modified to revised form                          
#                                      v03 on 02/16/10.                                                                                      
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0363
#     LINK_TITLE                      Full documentation may be found at
#                                     ftp://nssdcftp.gsfc.nasa.gov/spacecraft_data/imp/imp8/mag/15s_ascii_v3/00_IMP8_15s_data_docum.txt      
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              IMP8_Magnetic-Field_Definitive-H0_15sec_cdf
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/IMP8/MAG/PT15.36S
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. CDF time standard. Time of last data sequence in the 15.36-second average.
#  2. Data source flag =1 if based on 320ms data, = 2 if based  on old V2 15.36s data
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 20:09:54 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Data source flag =1 if based on 320ms data, = 2 if based  on old V2 15.36s data
#
EPOCH                   DATA_SOURCE_FLAG
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                  
30-10-1973 00:00:00.000                9

VariableDescription.Name: N_of_points
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Number of points in 15.36 second average. Max. number is 48(12) for data source flag equal 1(2)
